languages.text: Оправившись от диктатуры Чорда, Футфол вернул статус торгового сердца Простора. Усвоив горький урок, Владайм Токара учредил "Дружину ревнителей Футфола" — хорошо оснащенную армию наемников, подвластную лишь ему. Тень порядка пришла на Футфол.

After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.
languages.original_text: Оправившись от диктатуры Чорда, Футфол вернул статус торгового сердца Простора. Усвоив горький урок, Владайм Токара учредил "Дружину ревнителей Футфола" — хорошо оснащенную армию наемников, подвластную лишь ему. Тень порядка пришла на Футфол.

traits.locale_text: After recovering form Chorda dictatorship, Footfall reclaimed its status as a trading heart of Koronus Expanse. Vladaym Tocara, learning his lesson, created a Footfall Upholders' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army, that answered only to him. A sliver of order came to Footfall.

After recovering form Chorda dictatorship, Footfall reclaimed its status as a trading heart of Koronus Expanse. Vladaym Tocara, learning his lesson, created a Footfall Upholders' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army, that answered only to him. A sliver of order came to Footfall.

After recovering form Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A sliver of order returned to Footfall.

After recovering form Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A sliver of order returned to Footfall.

After recovering form Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

After recovering form Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

languages.text: 落脚港从库尔达的暴政中恢复过来，重新成为了整个科罗努斯扩区的贸易中心。弗拉迪姆·托卡拉从这件事情中吸取了惨痛教训，创立了落脚港游击自卫队。这支装备精良的雇佣军只听命于他个人，落脚港因此恢复了一定程度的秩序。
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港从库尔达的暴政中恢复过来，重新成为了整个科罗努斯扩区的贸易中心。弗拉迪姆·托卡拉从这件事情中吸取了惨痛教训，创立了落脚港游击自卫队。这支装备精良的雇佣军只听命于他个人，落脚港因此恢复了些许秩序。

languages.text: Nachdem es sich von Chordas Regime erholt hatte, erlangte Footfall seinen Status als Handelszentrale der Ausdehnung zurück. Vladaym Tocara hatte eine bittere Lektion gelernt und daraufhin die Miliz der Partisanen von Footfall gegründet — eine gut ausgerüstete Söldnerarmee, die allein ihm unterstand. Auf der Station herrschte fortan wieder ein gewisses Maß an Ordnung.
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem es sich von Chordas Regime erholt hatte, erlangte Footfall seinen Status als Handelszentrale der Ausdehnung zurück. Vladaym Tocara hatte eine bittere Lektion gelernt und daraufhin die Miliz der Partisanen von Footfall gegründet — eine gut ausgerüstete Söldnerarmee, die allein ihm unterstand. Auf Footfall herrschte fortan wieder ein gewisses Maß an Ordnung.

languages.text: Après s'être relevé du régime de Chorda, Castel retrouva son statut de capitale commerciale des Étendues. Cette leçon amère incita Vladaym Tocara à fonder la milice des partisans de Castel, une armée de mercenaires parfaitement équipés et n'obéissant qu'à ses ordres qui ramena un semblant d'ordre dans la station.
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: Après s'être relevé du régime de Chorda, Castel retrouva son statut de capitale commerciale des Étendues. Cette leçon amère incita Vladaym Tocara à fonder la milice des partisans de Castel, une armée de mercenaires parfaitement équipés et n'obéissant qu'à ses ordres qui ramena un semblant d'ordre dans la station.

languages.text: Tras recuperarse del régimen de Chorda, Paso recuperó su estado como centro comercial de la Extensión. Con la dolorosa lección aprendida, Vladaym Tocara creó la Milicia Independiente de Paso, un ejército mercenario bien equipado que respondía únicamente ante él. Así, la estación consiguió imponer un ápice de orden.
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: Tras recuperarse del régimen de Chorda, Paso recuperó su estado como centro comercial de la Extensión. Con la dolorosa lección aprendida, Vladaym Tocara creó la Milicia Independiente de Paso, un ejército mercenario bien equipado que respondía únicamente ante él. Así, la estación consiguió imponer un ápice de orden.

languages.text: チョーダ政権から立ち直ったフットフォールは、エクスパンスにおける交易の要所としての立場を取り戻した。苦い教訓を得たことで、ヴラダイム・トカラはフットフォール遊撃義勇軍 — 彼自身にしか従わない装備の整った傭兵軍を設立した。ステーションに一条の秩序が戻ったのだ。
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: チョーダ政権から立ち直ったフットフォールは、エクスパンスにおける交易の要所としての立場を取り戻した。苦い教訓を得たことで、ヴラダイム・トカラはフットフォール遊撃義勇軍 — 彼自身にしか従わない装備の整った傭兵軍を設立した。ステーションに一条の秩序が戻ったのだ。

languages.text: Chorda'nın hükümdarlığından kurtulan Binliman, Enginlik'in ticaret merkezi olma statüsünü geri kazandı. Dersini acı bir şekilde alan Vladaym Tocara; yalnızca kendisine hizmet eden, iyi donanımlı bir paralı asker ordusu olan Binliman Partizan Milis Kuvvetleri'ni kurdu. İstasyonda biraz da olsa düzen sağlandı.
languages.original_text: After recovering from Chorda's regime, Footfall reclaimed its status as the trading hub of the Expanse. Having learned a bitter lesson, Vladaym Tocara created the Footfall Partisans' Militia — a well-equipped mercenary army that answered only to him. A modicum of order returned to the station.

traits.locale_text: Chorda'nın hükümdarlığından kurtulan Binliman, Enginlik'in ticaret merkezi olma statüsünü geri kazandı. Dersini acı bir şekilde alan Vladaym Tocara, yalnızca ona hizmet eden, iyi donanımlı bir paralı asker ordusu olan Binliman Partizanları Milis Kuvvetlerini kurdu. İstasyon biraz da olsa yeniden düzene girdi.
